EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Quiz Taker that they've passed the module to continue to the next module
EmailTemplate.name: Quiz Pass Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Learning Check Results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Congratulations on passing the learning check! You may now continue onto the next module in the series. You'll get the link shortly in another email.
Please reach out with your questions trainers@homewise.org < mailto:trainers@homewise.org > or call us at 505-983-9473
Happy Learning,
Your Homewise Training Team
